InstallationÂ¶

We assume that you are using zc.buildout and the plone.recipe.zope2instance recipe to manage your project:

  • Add hexagonit.testing to the list of eggs to install, e.g.:

    [buildout]
...
eggs =
    ...
    hexagonit.testing

  • Re-run buildout, e.g. with:

    $ ./bin/buildout
